components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incident_updates.body: We have fixed the issue with Flex login and customers should no longer have issues logging into Flex. The issue was related to DNS. If customers are still having issues logging in it is advised to restart your application. We expect to provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We have fixed the issue with Flex login and customers should no longer have issues logging into Flex. The issue was related to DNS. If customers are still having issues logging in it is advised to restart your application.
We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Our monitoring systems have detected issues with logging into Flex. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We expect to provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected issues with logging into Flex. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We are seeing recovery however some customers will have issues when logging into flex. If customers are still having issues logging in they can restart their application and that can help with the issue.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issueSynthetic tests are failing for prod us1. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

Our engineers have identified the issue VoiceBase transcriptions issues and are working to deploy a fix. Customers might see some delays in Voice transcriptions, which we are currently investigating. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with VoiceBase transcriptions. Customers might see some delays in Voice transcriptions, which we are currently investigating. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Brisanet Network in Brazil

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Brisanet Network in Brazil. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Brisanet Network in Brazil. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Brisanet Network in Brazil. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Brisanet Network in Brazil. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Brisanet Network in Brazil. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Multiple Destination SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in the United States and Canada is conducting a planned maintenance from 03 April 2025 at 21:00 PDT until 04 April 2025 at 04:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from United States and Canada handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Toll-Free, North America
ZIPWHIP MESSAGING - SMS Long Code, North America
ZIPWHIP MESSAGING - SMS Toll-Free, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States SMS and MMS Carrier Maintenance - T-Mobile

incident_updates.body: The T-Mobile network in the United States is conducting a planned maintenance from 03 April 2025 at 21:00 PDT until 04 April 2025 at 04:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from T-Mobile United States handsets when sending via long codes and short codes.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Long Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Short Code, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: Multiple Destination SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in the United States and Canada is conducting a planned maintenance from 03 April 2025 at 21:30 PDT until 04 April 2025 at 06:30 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from United States and Canada handsets via subset of United States and Canada short codes.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: Canada Account Security Service Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our service partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 03 April 2025 at 22:00 PDT until 04 April 2025 at 02:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for the following carrier and country: Bell Canada.

Impacted Products: Lookup Identity Match, Lookup Line Type Intelligence [Twilio API], Lookup SIM Swap, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Lookup Line Type Intelligence [Twilio API]

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in the United States is conducting a planned maintenance from 07 April 2025 at 23:00 PDT until 08 April 2025 at 03:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from United States handsets via United States short codes.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: Multiple Destination Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in Norway, France, Croatia, Italy, the Netherlands, Estonia, Hungary, Bulgaria, Denmark, Indonesia, the United Kingdom, the Czech Republic, Mexico, Ukraine, Austria, Costa Rica, Finland, Ireland, Peru and Sweden is conducting a planned maintenance from 08 April 2025 at 02:00 PDT until 08 April 2025 at 10:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be Intermittent delays from and to Twilio Norway, France, Croatia, Italy, Netherlands, Estonia, Hungary, Bulgaria, Denmark, Indonesia, United Kingdom, Czech Republic, Mexico, Ukraine, Austria, Costa Rica, Finland, Ireland, Peru and Sweden phone numbers.

Our Voice carrier partner in Singapore is conducting a planned maintenance from 08 April 2025 at 02:00 PDT until 08 April 2025 at 10:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be Intermittent delays from and to Twilio Singapore phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carrier Maintenance - Small US Carriers

incident_updates.body: A subset of small networks in the US are conducting a planned maintenance from 08 April 2025 at 02:00 PDT until 08 April 2025 at 04:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from small US carriers handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Toll-Free, North America
ZIPWHIP MESSAGING - SMS Long Code, North America
ZIPWHIP MESSAGING - SMS Toll-Free, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: Costa Rica SMS Carrier Maintenance - Kolbi

incident_updates.body: The Kolbi network in Costa Rica is conducting a planned maintenance from 09 April 2025 at 19:00 PDT until 09 April 2025 at 23:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Kolbi Costa Rica handsets.

Our SMS carrier partner in Singapore is conducting a planned maintenance from 10 April 2025 at 05:00 PDT until 10 April 2025 at 08:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Singapore handsets via subset of Singapore short codes.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 02 April 2025 at 13:00 PDT until 28 April 2025 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

02 April 2025 at 13:00 PDT until 02 April 2025 at 17:00 PDT
07 April 2025 at 13:00 PDT until 07 April 2025 at 17:00 PDT
09 April 2025 at 13:00 PDT until 09 April 2025 at 17:00 PDT
14 April 2025 at 13:00 PDT until 14 April 2025 at 17:00 PDT
16 April 2025 at 13:00 PDT until 16 April 2025 at 17:00 PDT
21 April 2025 at 13:00 PDT until 21 April 2025 at 17:00 PDT
23 April 2025 at 13:00 PDT until 23 April 2025 at 17:00 PDT
28 April 2025 at 13:00 PDT until 28 April 2025 at 17:00 PDT
